page.title: 15Housing
page.content: The village of Repton contains a variety of houses dating from 1600 up to the present day. There are 5 main newish{housing} {areas}in Repton: The Pastures, Chestnut Way, Springfield Road, Askew Grove and Mount Pleasant. Several properties have changed their function, for example the local chemist shop used to be a billiard hall, the Cross Stores was a butcher's shop and a School boarding House used to be an inn. The{corner shop,}now owned by Mr.Ray Causer, is situated at one end of the village and was first opened in 1842. Newton Solney has 2 housing developments, one being a more secluded and expensive at Newton Park, an area adjoining the 3 star hotel called the Newton Park Hotel.
